name: Forecasting Demand - Business User App
description: Forecasting Demand at Product Level using time series trained models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Demand Forecasting Electronics Production

Overview

This app helps forecast future demand for electronic products using advanced ML models. It supports better production planning, inventory management, and resource allocation by accurately predicting product-level demand across selected time horizons.

Input - The app takes historical and product-specific data including:

  • + Product Category, Product Name, Total Quantity Sold, Forecast Interval (e.g., Monthly)
  • +Forecast Duration (in periods/months)

Output - This App provides:

  • + Predicted sales for upcoming months.
  • + Easy-to-read forecast trends.
  • + Confidence band to understand possible variation

Benifits

  • + Match Production to Actual Demand: Cut waste from overproduction and avoid missed sales from shortages.
  • + Reduce Warehousing Costs: Keep just enough inventory on hand based on accurate predictions.
  • + Plan Staff and Materials Better: Schedule the right resources at the right time for production runs.
  • + Meet Delivery SLA: Maintain consistent product availability for your customers.
  • + Make Smarter Growth Decisions: Base expansion plans on reliable demand projections.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
Product CategoryThe identifier or name of the Product Category where the item was sold.
Product NameThe identifier or name of the item sold.
Total_Quantity_SoldThe total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.
